name: 10101: "Will" the Starship
summary:
Combines elements of battle with the enemy shooting style SF RPG. Iijima, including love, talent, Kyoko Hikami, and casting the gorgeous actors and Ishida Akira, enjoy a full voice in the specification immersive play. Space Battleship "Will" became the captain of the enemy to defeat Keasu Let the adventure of space.

This game, the player becomes the captain of the Space Battleship Will, we will promote good sailing while Will.
